'''''Mario''''' is a German illustrated Text-Adventure and parody which is based on ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''. All names are changed.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> It covers chapter 4 and 5 of Book 2 of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.<ref>[http://www.faqs.org/faqs/tolkien/games/ FAQS, Tolkien Games] (retrieved 4 September 201)</ref>
